* Several Different mouse designs.
* Wide range of colours.
* Varied sizes.
* Customise cursors for differ software programs.

* Customisable keyboard shortcuts.
* Low Memory and CPU utilisation.

[olist]
[*] Collect your .CUR or .ANI files and rename them to numbers between 0 and 89 (Example: 12.ANI).
[*] Copy them to YoloMouse\Cursors.
[*] Restart yolomouse.
[*] Test using CTRL ALT 1 and CTRL ALT 3.
[/olist]
[h1] Stuff I'd love to see added to YoloMouse[/h1]
[list]
[*] Easier adding of custom cursors
[i]A small thing, but would be useful.[/i]
